Manage Profile

Detailed Job Description

  • Front End Developer (8 Openings)
  • Company: Al Futtaim Technologies
  • Location: Dubai, UAE
  • Max Annual Gross Pay (INR) : 5,00,000
  • Max Reward (INR): 10,000

Using Javascript and frame work setting up entities and Special Investment Vehicles in Dubai mainland, DIFC, freezones, Cayman Islands for various investments of shareholders. Managing finance and accounting, annual audit, annual compliance and returns of all the entities. Managing accounting of chairman’s personal statements.

Looking for a senior level associate with a minimum relevant experince of 10 - 15 yrs on a permanent role. He should hold a graduate certificate spealized in Computer Science


Required Skills

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript

Preferences

  • Nationality : Indian
  • Gender : Male
  • Age : 22 - 28 yrs
